Title: WPFiPhone - Accurate Imitation of the iPhone with the power of WPF
Description:
WPFiPhone is an accurate imitation of the iPhone OS completely written in WPF.

The demo app is developed in C# (with the .NET Framework 4.0). All GUI-Elements are implemented as WPF Controls so it is possible to use them separately.

I am still refactoring the source code. The source code will be available soon ...

Up until that time check out the executable .... (Downloads ->Planned)
